join_selector

Enumerates types of joins.

Synopsis 

enum join_selector {join_convex, join_concave, join_continue, join_spike};

Values

Value

Description

join_convex

join_concave

join_continue

join_spike

Header

#include <boost/geometry/strategies/buffer.hpp>
